column8: ตำแหน่ง : Online Community Admin (remote) – พิจารณาพิเศษถ้าสื่อสารภาษาจีนหรอญี่ปุ่นได้ สถานที่ : กรุงเทพมหานคร (remote) ประเภท : งานประจำ งานประจำรายเดือน อัตราค่าตอบแทนคิดตามวันทำงานจริง 600 บาท/วัน (800 บาท/วัน หากสื่อสารภาษาจีนหรือญี่ปุ่นได้) ทำงาน 5 วัน/สัปดาห์ (หรือสามารถเลือกทำทุกวันได้) เวลาทำงาน 08:00-17:00 KPI Bonus สูงสุด 2000 THB/month สามารถได้รับการโปรโมทและโตไปพร้อมกับบริษัท ความรับผิดชอบ : ดูแลและตรวจสอบเครือข่ายผู้ใช้งานแพลตฟอร์ม ติดต่อประสานงานกับผู้ให้บริการ ผ่านทางช่องทางออนไลน์และโทรศัพท์ ให้ความช่วยเหลือผู้ให้บริการและนักเดินทาง ผ่านทางช่องทางออนไลน์และโทรศัพท์ บริหารฐานข้อมูลของผู้ใช้งานแพลตฟอร์ม คุณสมบัติ : มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์และการสื่อสารที่ดี สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษและไทยได้เป็นอย่างดี พิจารณาพิเศษถ้าสามารถสื่อสารภาษาจีนหรอญี่ปุ่นได้ สามารถแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี มีความสนใจในธุรกิจการท่องเที่ยวและให้บริการ มีทักษะในการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์โปรแกรมพื้นฐานได้ดี (MS Office suite) สวัสดิการ : สามารถทำงานจากที่ไหนก็ได้ (remote/work-from-home หรือ hybrid) โอกาสที่จะเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของสตาร์ทอัพด้านการท่องเที่ยว และเติบโตไปพร้อมกับ GoBuddy วิธีการสมัคร : ผู้สนใจสามารถสมัครผ่าน JobsDB เกี่ยวกับ GoBuddy : GoBuddy เชื่อมโยงนักเดินทางกับคนพื้นที่สำหรับบริการด้านการท่องเที่ยวและภาษา โดยเราเชื่อว่าใครๆ ก็สามารถทำงานนี้ได้ เรามุ่งมั่นที่จะพัฒนาอุตสาหกรรมการท่องเที่ยว เพื่อให้ทุกคนสามารถเข้าถึงบริการด้านการเดินทางได้ในราคาที่เหมาะสม

Jobtitle: Admin Specialist (Chinese Speaking)
column8: Our client is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices. With integrated solutions across four key domains – telecom networks, IT, smart devices, and cloud services. General Description of Duties and Responsibilities Managing and handling the overall process for Vehicle Management. Managing Vehicle contract terms inspection and Inefficient vehicle management for three consecutive months. Handling driver EHS violation supervision. Parking space usage check. Handling vehicle fee acceptance: overtime fee, parking fee, detention fee, over-mileage fee, etc. Randomly checking the abnormal vehicle usage and vehicle orders. Handling Vehicle monthly reports. Supervising and checking Driver etiquette and Handling of employee vehicle parking cards. Handling the platform car dispatching arrangement. Shuttle line management. Candidate Requirements Bachelor’s Degree in any related field. Above 5 years of work experience in the Admin/HR/Logistics field, better management capabilities. Strong leadership and communication skills. Open personality, active thinking, Fast learning, communication and have service mind. English and Chinese can be used as a working language.

Jobtitle: Senior HR & Admin Officer
column8: Responsibilities: Support in all HR and Admin functions for Thailand. Work closely with regional HR team to ensure that all strategic plans and initiatives for local employees are aligned with corporate and business objective. Manage end to end employee life cycle processes such as onboarding, induction, learning & development, performance appraisal, final settlements, etc. Develop and implement HR policies and procedures in compliance with local labor laws and regulations. Support business leaders to develop & execute HR strategies to enhance the overall business strategies. Maintain employee records and ensure data confidentiality. Oversee general administrative functions, including office supplies, facility management, and vendor relationships. Perform other duties as required. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience in a similar role. Solid knowledge of Thailand's labor laws and regulations. HR Experience in the engineering or construction industry is preferred. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with willingness and agility to change. Fluency in both written and spoken English and Thai. For interested parties, please click below "Apply now" button to apply with your resume in English and expected salary. All applications will be treated in strict confidence and only be used for recruitment related purpose.

Jobtitle: Internship:  Legal & Immigration
column8: As an intern, you will be an extension of the team and an integral component to the team’s daily tasks and operations. This internship will also provide you an opportunity to learn the essentials of legal, immigration and client interaction as well as expanding your knowledge and skills. Interns will be assigned to one of the following departments: Law Firm (Litigation, Family, Property & Corporate) Immigration Team (Thai, US, UK, and Countries Worldwide) Marketing Team (Social Media Channels, TikTok, YouTube) Qualifications & Responsibilities: Strong English skills is a must Support Siam Legal and its team members Assist and complete assignments from our lawyers and immigration consultants Research and update legal, immigration, or travel topics Draft documents in English and able to speak English with international clients Perform research and market analysis activities Assist in administrative duties and clerical tasks Siam Legal is Thailand's largest legal service network with offices in Bangkok, Phuket, Chiang Mai and Pattaya.  We assist foreigners traveling to Thailand as well as provide full legal and immigration services as a premier international law firm.  If you like interacting with international clients and using your English skills, we are the place for you!

Jobtitle: Talent Acquisition Specialist
column8: Responsibilities Review resumes, conduct initial interviews, and assess candidates for qualifications, skills, and cultural fit. Conduct in-depth interviews, both in-person and remotely, to evaluate candidates' suitability for specific roles within the company. Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process, from initial contact to final selection. Work closely with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and provide guidance on the recruitment process. Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records and recruitment metrics. Offer and Negotiation: Facilitate job offers, negotiate terms, and assist with the onboarding process. Stay up-to-date with employment laws and regulations to ensure all recruitment practices are compliant. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in human resources, Business Administration, or a related field. Minimum 2 years of experience in recruitment in startups or corporates Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to assess candidates for skills, qualifications, and cultural fit. Excellent time management and organizational skills. Ability to adapt to changing priorities in a fast-paced environment. Commitment to maintaining confidentiality and professionalism. Diplomatic, Friendly personality and Service-Minded

Jobtitle: HRIS - HR Analytics Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ระบบสารสนเทศทรัพยากรบุคคล
column8: ตรวจสอบรวบรวมรายชื่อพนักงานสาขา ที่ต้นสังกัดขอโอนย้ายสาขาจากอีเมลล์ในแต่ละวัน จัดทำคำสั่งการโอนย้าย, การแต่งตั้ง และ/หรือ การปรับเปลี่ยนตำแหน่งงาน เป็นรายวัน, รายสัปดาห์ หรือรายเดือน ประสานงานฝ่ายIT ส่งข้อมูลการโอนย้ายและการแต่งตั้งพนักงาน เพื่อ Update ในระบบ IT ให้ถูกต้องตรงกัน จัดเก็บคำสั่งและข้อมูลประวัติการโอนย้าย ไว้อ้างอิงและตรวจสอบได้ ปรับปรุงแก้ไขข้อมูลพนักงานในระบบสารสนเทศงานบุคคล (HRIS) ให้ถูกต้องและเป็นปัจจุบันตรงตามคำสั่งโยกย้าย ปรับปรุงข้อมูลพนักงานในระบบงาน HRIS ให้ถูกต้องตามโครงสร้าง ชื่อตำแหน่ง, หน่วยงาน, สังกัด คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร วุฒิ ป.ตรี ขึ้นไป สถิติประยุกต์, เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, บริหารงานบุคคล หรือใกล้เคียง มีประสบการณ์การทำงาน 1-3 ปี มีทักษะการใช้ Excel Advance, Pivot, V-Lookup มีประสบการณ์ การจัดทำข้อมูลพนักงานในธุรกิจขนาดใหญ่ และ/หรือธุรกิจที่มีสาขา มีประสบการณ์ งานด้าน HRIS, HR Analytics, HR MIS สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาและทำงานในวันหยุดได้ มีประสบการณ์งานในธุรกิจการเงิน, ธุรกิจที่มีสาขาทั่วประเทศ  จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Jobtitle: Senior HR Generalist (Business Partner)
column8: ABOUT THE ROLE This position will be responsible for HR functions of designated business unit such as Logistics, or Freights Forwarding. HR functions are Recruitment, Training, Welfare & benefits, Employee relation, CSR and other requirements related to Quality system. This position must work closely with department managers, supervisor and staff to provide quality services and solutions. Working Location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/pkzst6pCQ9ZASgH88 [link removed] WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING Recruitment Be responsible for end to end recruitment & selection process by following the company Recruitment Plan Prepare shortlisted candidates and arrange interview with all concerned parties Manage manpower requisitions with hiring managers to ensure they are all approved by MD Follow up the interview feedback and finalize the successful candidates Manage onboarding process Follow up probation assessment Control supplier for outsourced employee recruitment Compensation & Benefits Employees medical claims coordinating Monitor Leave and attendance records Overtimes records follow-up and statistic to Managers HR Development Identify Training needs analysis. Implement and execute Training and Development Plan. Maintain Training records. Employee Relation and CSR Implement and execute Employee activities and CSR plan Promote and Communicate all activity to internal and external via Bollore platforms Work with team as organizer in common activities; annual trip, sport day and staff party. HR Management Maintain HR Policies/procedures and maintain the Internal Rules and Employee Handbook Update and follow up of staff personal file Assist HR Manager in special projects from regional or HQ Other HR related task and ad hoc project as assigned Administration Managing of Maid & Security Team THE SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE Essential: Minimum in Bachelor’s degree in any relevant area, preferably in HR Management Minimum of 5 years’ experience in HRBP (Recruitment & Training) Excellent command of both spoken & written English and Thai Knowledge of labor law and relevant regulatory requirements Able to travel between Sukhumvit Office & Warehouse (around Bangna-Trad KM.19) Desirable: High level of confidentiality, organized and detail-conscious Good communication & interpersonal skills Proficiency in MS Office applications (especially excel) Have own car will be advantage BENEFITS Provident Fund after passed probation Group Insurance: Health (IPD&OPD), Accident, and Dental Fixed & Performance Bonus Annual Leave start from 12 days/year An attractive remuneration and fringe benefits will be offered to the qualified candidate. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Bollore Logistics (Thailand) Co., Ltd. Tel: 02 261 1920-30 ext. 10802 Website : www.bollore.com [link removed]

Jobtitle: Executive’s Interpreter & Secretary/ล่ามและเลขานุการผู้บริหารชาวญี่ปุ่น
column8: Interpretation and Translation Duties: Provide interpretation in Thai, Japanese, and English during meetings, negotiations, and events involving the Executive and both internal and external international stakeholders. Responsible for translating important documents, ensuring accurate information transfer between multiple languages. Execution of Secretarial Tasks: Coordinate the scheduling, minute-taking, and facilitation of important company meetings. Compile and organize presentation materials from various departments. Prepare for and accompany the Executive on business trips, approximately once a month for 2 days within Thailand, and twice a year for about a week to Japan. Create and prepare documents as requested by the Executive ,ensuring hight-quality and timely delivery of all required materials. Key Responsibilities: Deliver high-precision interpretation for the Executive's communications. Handle highly confidential information responsibly and maintain strict confidentiality. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or higher. Experience: At least 2 years of experience in secretarial work. Language Skills: Thai (Business level), Japanese (Business level, JLPT N2 or above), English (Business level, TOEFL iBT 90～/TOEFL ITP 577～/TOEIC 800～) Good computer skill in MS Office programs such as MS Excel, MS PowerPoint. Fixed-term employment 3 years Expected Start Date:1 March 2024 สวัสดิการ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม, กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ , โบนัส กิจกรรมสันทนาการต่างๆ,ทุนการศึกษาบุตร เลือกเวลาเข้าทำงานได้ฯลฯ , ทำงาน จ - ศ Attention: Human Resources Department Calbee Tanawat Co., Ltd. 3195/6 Vibulthani Tower (Esso Building), 1th Floor, Rama 4 Rd., Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Tel : 02-665-6220 All applications will be treated strictly confidential

Jobtitle: Senior HR and Government Liaison
Company: St. Andrews International School, Green Valley (Rayong)
column8: Position Objective Senior HR and Government Liaison is generally assigned to provide services to School Management Team and employees in all areas of HR and government liaison and relevant tasks in the school for the achievement of efficient and qualified services for school and employees. Provide administrative support to the whole school in relation to all documents and processing required for all expat staff’s visa & work permit. Responsibilities The job holder’s responsibility for promoting and safeguarding the welfare of children s/he is responsible for or comes into contact with, as below: To comply with safeguarding policies, procedures, and code of conduct To demonstrate a personal commitment to safeguarding and student/colleague wellbeing To ensure that any safeguarding concerns or incidents are reported appropriately in line with the policy To engage in safeguarding training when required HR role: Human resources (HR) is required to complete  wide variety of actions, common tasks starting from Manpower Requisition stage to Recruitment and Selection, Background Check, Compensation & Benefit, Training & Development, Rotation, Resignation, etc., to be aligned with school and Cognita policies. Co-ordination of the annual performance, salary and bonus review. Produce monthly and ad-hoc HR reports such as headcount, SCR reports and the monthly HR summary reports. Maintain employee data both in the school HRIS and in MOE portal up to date. Coordinate with HR C&B in term of providing information for monthly payroll. Register or withdraw eligible employees to Social Security fund Register or withdraw eligible employees to school provident fund Register of withdraw eligible employees to medical insurance & Personal Accident Group insurance Conduct and / or coordinate an orientation for new hires Ad hoc tasks are possible to happen along the way which could be stated as any works as assigned. Government Liaison role: The Senior HR and Government Liaison works together with the Government Liaison Officer to reassure that all the tasks related to government liaison run smoothly with good collaboration, proactive and efficiency. New Teachers Receive information regarding new teachers from Head of School and/or Head of HR Thailand and provide support for their visa application outside Thailand. Inform new teachers of all information and processing before arrival to Thailand Obtain Thai Teaching License for the new teachers. Obtain work permit and extend visa when required. Accompany new teachers to Labour & Immigration office for Work Permit & Visa process. Assist new teachers’ family with visa application. Assist new teachers to SCB bank to open bank account. Support new teachers to settle in to the school. Current Teachers Support all expat staff and contractual dependents relate to 90 days report that required by Thailand immigration regulation. Renewing visa and work permit for all expat employees and contractual dependents. Reminding expat staff for re-entry permit. Renew Thai Teaching license for teachers. Arrange medical check for expat staff for purpose of work permit renewal. Parents and Students Providing information and support documents for student’s visa application. Coordinate with local OPEC (Office of Private Education Commissions) Handle documentation required by the local Office of Private Education Commissions such as school fees structure, appoint and withdraw teacher, obtaining permit for using buildings etc. Position Requirements Highly motivated with an eye for detail and quality of work. Must be reliable and flexible, with ability to multitask and meet deadlines. Proven ability to build trust, credibility and forge effective working relationships at all levels in the organisation Good interpersonal and customer service skills Excellent written and oral English and Thai, Ability to multi task, Professional telephone etiquette Detail oriented and systematic thinking. Experience in this position will highly be advantage. Qualifications 3 years experience in a true HR generalist role with responsibility across the full scope of HR. Degree in HR or related fields. Sound working knowledge and experience in operation of visa & work permit is advantage. Contacts All departments, management, Government Office. Working Conditions Located at St Andrew’s International School, Green Valley, Rayong, Thailand Occasional evening and weekend work Terms of Employment Standard hours are 7.30 am to 4.30 pm Medical insurance/ Personal Accident Insurance Competitive salary and benefits (Provident Fund, Social Securities Fund and Discretion bonus based on school performance) Cognita Schools are committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and expects all staff and volunteers to share this commitment.  To be considered for employment at a Cognita School, pre-employment background checks are mandatory.

Jobtitle: Factory Office Manager (admin + HR + operation) - footwear manufacturer...
column8: THE COMPANY : Hong Kong company over 30 years history Footwear manufacturer Main product : leather casual shoes Factory : SE Asia 3000-4000 workers Main market : Europe for international footwear & lifestyle brands We are looking for OFFICE MANAGER (factory admin + HR + operation) – with details as follows : JOB SUMMARY : You will oversee all daily operations of the SE Asian Plant ( 3000-4000 workers) including but not limited to human resources, office administration, purchasing, logistics...etc (except production) to ensuring policies and procedures are followed. Report to the Business Owner THE JOB : Tertiary education is preferable Solid managerial level in factory admin, factory operations or human resources functions in manufacturers Proficient in English and Chinese ; Mandarin is a plus Experience in footwear or garment is a plus Experience in SE Asian factories is a plus Fully responsible for managing all round administrative & operation functions (except production) in SE Asian factory Oversee all-round administrative functions including daily operations, recruitment, staffing, employee relationship, canteen and staff quarters etc Review and enhance administrative/operation/human resources policies and procedures. Manage day-to-day factory operation including but not limited to purchasing, material control, logistics....etc Support Production Manager during overseas buyers visits to SE Asian factory Coordinate with internal departments and external parties related to factory affairs Work based in SE Asian factory (1.5 hours from airport) Frequent trip to Hong Kong is eligible 12 round trip air ticket per year Annual leave : 14 days Hong Kong employment contract Accomodation and meals provided Enjoy SE Asian holiday (Year 2024 : 24 days) TO APPLY for this job or similar jobs : For secure and confidential job application, please click the below link to get our email address. http://jpc.hk/confidential_apply.htm [link removed] JPC Recruiting Services was established in 1990. We provide free job hunting services to job seekers. To speed up our process, please do NOT send us download links. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used for recruitment purpose only. Your privacy is guaranteed. We will never give out, lease, or sell your personal information.

Especially booking flights, hotels, and drivers, and arranging meeting appointments. English is Lower- Intermediate Level

column8: Industry Summary: The International Leading in Network & Technology Business Location: Bangkok (BTS Line) Job Reference: BSM 50214 JOB SUMMARY: As an HR Specialist, you will lead the recruitment process, from sourcing and reaching out to qualified candidates to coordinating the end-to-end hiring process. Analyze recruitment performance, recommend improvements, and implement changes. Act as a liaison between candidates and hiring managers, enhancing the overall candidate experience. Bring 7-15 years of HR experience, including recruitment activities and familiarity with HR planning and strategy. JOB DESCRIPTION: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to execute marketing campaigns. Analyze campaign data to generate insightful reports. Enhance Murata's visibility through inbound and outbound marketing initiatives. Work with stakeholders to develop and implement effective marketing strategies. Manage and design marketing campaigns across online and offline channels. Generate creative ideas for brand and product promotion. Gain a deep understanding of Murata's products and sales strategies. QUALIFICATION : Bachelor's degree in any related fields. At least 7-15 years in HR Experience with focus on Recruitment & Interviewing. Recruitment experience in the IT industry is a plus. Experience in Japanese or international companies is welcomed. Experience in HRM, HRD, data analysis, data management, HR planning, and strategy. Knowledge of Labor Law. Good command of English Salary: Up to 63,000 THB (Based on experience & qualifications) Benefit: Attractive & Competitive Employee Type: Full Time/ Permanent **Only Shortlisted Candidates will be Considered** If you are interested, please do not hesitate to send your full English resume by clicking Apply. Sirapatsorn (Chilli) Amarin Tower, Unit A, 5th Floor, 496-502, Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 (BTS Chidlom) Tel: 063 323 5079 WEBSITE: www.smartcruit.co [link removed] LINE: @SMARTCRUIT [link removed] FACEBOOK: Smartcruit [link removed] (Salaryland: Mindset l Attitude l How To l Work-Life เพื่อวัยทำงานให้ประสิทธิภาพเพิ่มขึ้น 99%)

Jobtitle: Japanese Speaking ERP Sales Executive / BTS / JLPT N2
column8: Position: ERP Sales Executive - Japanese Speaking Location: Asoke BTS Salary: 40,000 - 70,000 THB / Month Benefits: Transportation Allowance:   Actual Subsidy: 300 Baht/Month [After Pass Probation] Benefits: Social Insurance, OPD/IPD, Annual Medical Health Check and others [Company’s Regulation] Bonus:  2 Times/Year [Performance] Annual Leave: 6 Days/Year [1 day add every year / maximum 20 days] Working Day: Monday – Friday Working Time: 09:00 a.m. – 18:00 p.m. Job Description Client Acquisition & Relationship Management: Identify potential clients for ERP solutions. Cultivate relationships with existing clients. Network at events to generate leads. Sales Strategy & Execution: Develop and execute sales strategies. Present ERP software to potential clients. Position solutions against competitors. Needs Analysis & Solution Customization: Analyze client requirements. Customize ERP solutions with technical teams. Deliver tailored presentations. Contract Negotiations & Closing Deals: Negotiate contract terms. Exceed sales quotas. Ensure compliant contracts. After-Sales Support & Account Management: Provide support for client satisfaction. Identify upselling opportunities. Communicate updates and features. Market Analysis & Reporting: Stay updated on industry trends. Provide feedback to product teams. Deliver sales reports to management. Collaboration with Internal Teams: Work with marketing for effective materials. Collaborate with product development. Coordinate with customer service teams. Continual Learning & Professional Development: Stay informed on ERP technologies. Attend training and webinars. Participate in industry forums. Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Sales Japanese Speaking (N2 level or higher) in IT, software field would be advantage. Bachelor’s degree in business administration, marketing, engineering, or a related field. Understanding the manufacturing business, such as production plan, purchase order issuance, sales order issuance, costing, inventory, etc. would be advantage. Good command in both Thai and English. Strong presentation and communication skills. Strong analytical, problem solving, and interpersonal skills including positive attitude. Ability to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events. Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by APPLY NOW JAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd 10F Emporium Tower  622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Contact : K.Pan Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website : https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

Jobtitle: Event Coordinator and Secretary (Must Japanese language N2)
column8: Job Description Assist and support tasks assigned by Managing Director Coordinate between related departments and external organizations related to business matching event Support customers for business matching event Manage event operation Manage exhibitor, visitor, invoice list and Document(For business matching event only) Create documents related to business matching event Translate documents (Related Event) Job Requirements Bachelor's degree 1.5 year of working experiences JLPT N2 is a must Flexibility to handle various type of work Willing to challenge on difficult tasks

Jobtitle: Driver/พนักงานขับรถ
column8: Position:                 Driver Reports to: General Services manager (GSM) Supervises: N/A Work Week: 44 hour, 5 day work week (in emergencies or on occasions may be asked to work in addition to or outside standard working hours, especially if up-country) Duty Station: Peace Corps Office, Bangkok (Dusit District) (Domestic travel as required) Special Notes: This position requires significant travel in Thailand, including 4 months at the training site each year. Position Summary: The Driver transports Peace Corps staff, Volunteers and other personnel conducting official Peace Corps business.  S/he assures that vehicles are properly maintained and operated according to Peace Corps and US Government guidelines, and manufacturer specifications. Major Duties and Responsibilities include, but are not limited to the following: Transportation and Vehicle Maintenance Provides safe and courteous transportation to staff, Volunteers, Trainees, and post visitors as assigned. Successfully completes Smith System driver’s training as offered by the U.S. Embassy. Is available to provide official transportation during the work day as well as at times outside established office hours to accommodate the needs of Peace Corps such as with late flight arrivals. Operates vehicles in accordance with the traffic laws of Thailand, the policies of Peace Corps, and the policies of the United States Government. Assumes responsibility for the safe storage of vehicles at Peace Corps facilities, as well as in acceptable locations when traveling over night to other locations. Maintains a safe, secure, and clear garage facility. Must be willing to travel and work extended hours at times. Provides driving and accompaniment services for PC cashier (or delegate) while transporting cash to and from Peace Corps office. When necessary performs basic vehicle maintenance so ensure safe driving conditions Practices defensive driving techniques. Ensures the safety and security of all passengers (including the driver themself) and Peace Corps vehicles and property by adhering to driving safety and security guidelines including, but not limited to, wearing seatbelts, no smoking, no phone usage, and not driving under the influence of drugs or alcohol. Reads and understands the appropriate procedures to follow in the event of an accident, per MS 524. Maintains detailed vehicle logs for all travel in the Peace Corps vehicles, including stops, mileage, fueling, and maintenance.  Submits logs weekly and on a timely basis. Procures fuel and automotive supplies as needed. Cleans the vehicles using Covid-19 required disinfectant products and cleaning measures, and keeps proper paperwork related to this type of maintenance Keeps the vehicles orderly and free of personal possessions. Office Support and Administration Provides administrative and office support: make Xerox/scan copies, print and bind documents, laminate documents Provides manual labor and other logistic support for various activities/events: conference room setup, office furniture and equipment relocation, residence moving support, drinking water bottles replacement, etc. Performs maintenance work as backup or as needed, including change the light bulb, clean the pipe drainage, basic fixing for electric appliance/furniture/office equipment and others as needed. Assists in identification of new vendors, obtains quotations/brochures and gets clarification on the payment method Obtains appropriate cash advances for travel, small purchases or services.  Clears all advances in a timely manner not to exceed 72 hours but as soon as possible in all cases. Assists the Cashier and/or DMO in making payments and small purchases. Submits all receipts properly translated. Picks up/delivers mail to/from the U.S. Embassy, packing & mailing service at post, customs office, or other designated sites Completes all required Peace Corps trainings including confidentiality, harassment, and safety/security topics as mandated by Post or Peace Corps headquarters. Site Visits and Training Spends significant time driving on up-country trips with other staff, possibly for weeks at a time. Supports Peace Corps staff outside of driving during site visits, events, Pre-Service Training, conferences, etc. Assists in conducting annual Market Basket Survey. Safety and Security Every Peace Corps Thailand staff member has duties and responsibilities directly and/or indirectly associated with Safety and Security. The duties and responsibilities include, but are not limited to, the following: Operates Peace Corps vehicles safely at all times. Immediately communicates Volunteer safety and security concerns and issues to the Safety and Security Manager (SSM) and CD. Knowledgeable and supportive of Peace Corps safety and security policies and procedures, including the timely reporting of suspicious incidents, persons or articles. Reads and understands all Peace Corps directives regarding Safety and Security of staff and Volunteers/Trainees. Understands emergency procedures at both Volunteer sites and office. Liabilities and Responsibilities Assumes personal responsibility for fines and penalties imposed as a result of traffic violations within Thailand Uses U.S. Government property – including phones, vehicles, office equipment, tools, computers, physical property (land and buildings), and any other material resources purchased using U.S. Government funds – responsibly, and for fulfillment of official business only. Understands and practices principles of diversity and inclusion, and refrains from making gratuitous remarks or remarks which a reasonable person would label as “insensitive” or “discourteous.” Treats information obtained – read or heard – with confidentially and with sensitivity. Occasional Money Holder The personal service contractor (PSC) may be requested to courier cash and/or purchase orders to various vendors who furnish supplies and/or services to Pre-Service Training/In-Service Training site, or other locations as directed by the Contracting Officer.  The PSC may also be requested to courier cash to Peace Corps trainees or volunteers.  The PSC will not be functioning as a procurement or disbursing official but will only be acting as an intermediary between the Contracting or Disbursing Officer and the recipient.  In the case of dealing with vendors, the PSC will not exercise any procurement discretion concerning the supplies or services to be purchased or the cost limits of these purchases; these will be determined by the Contracting Officer. COVID-19 Given that as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic there will be a lengthy period where there are likely to be limited or no Peace Corps Trainees and/or Volunteers (jointly referred to as “Volunteers”) at Peace Corps/[Country], the PSC may be temporarily assigned during the COVID-19 pandemic, as determined by the Peace Corps Director, to carry out additional duties and responsibilities in furtherance of the goals of the Peace Corps in order to enhance the ability of Peace Corps Volunteers to perform functions under the Peace Corps Act, including facilitating a safe environment in order for the successful return of Volunteers. This temporary assignment may require the PSC to provide services and/or support beyond what is listed in their current Statement of Work (SOW).  The services and/or support may take many forms, examples of which may include but are not limited to, training, providing administrative, technical, medical, and/or operational assistance, building on host country programs, etc.  This temporary assignment also may require the PSC to provide these services and/or support to individuals/organizations other than those listed in their current SOW such as host country government, partner organization(s), community member(s), staff, and/or contractors. TDY The Contractor is subject to worldwide availability and may be requested by the Peace Corps to be reassigned or transferred permanently to another Peace Corps Post/Headquarters or perform temporary duties (TDY) as required and to travel to other assignments within Peace Corps’ as assigned. Any such reassignment or transfer shall be subject to agreement of the Contractor. The Statement of Work as defined will remain the same; however the duties may be subject to change as determined by the Contracting Officer. Other Duties as Assigned: May perform other duties as assigned by the Country   Director, Director of Management and Operations (DMO), or General Services Manager (GSM) as needs require. Required Qualifications: Education: High School or Vocational School Diploma Prior Work Experience: 3 years or more as a professional driver Valid driver's license Clean driving record Pass a regular health check, including vision, hearing, blood pressure, and chest x-ray Must be able to perform moderately physically demanding work Language: Thai Fluency (speaking, reading, and writing) Experience driving all types of vehicles, including cars, SUVs, and vans Knowledge: Driving rules and regulation, Basic auto repair, Routes and roadways in Thailand, Proficiency with computers, smart phones, and mapping applications. Solid coordination and organizational skills Excellent cross-cultural communication skills Capacity to relate to people from a diverse range of social and cultural backgrounds Commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusivity in the workplace Flexible, motivated, and self-directed Must exhibit good judgment, courtesy, tact and the proper protocol when interacting with Volunteers, staff, vendors, visitors, and other members of the public. Preferred Qualifications: Prior Work Experience: 5 years or more as a professional driver Language: English Proficiency (speaking, reading, and writing) Experience as a vehicle mechanic Prior facilities maintenance experience Prior experience working with international organizations Prior experience working with racially, ethnically, socioeconomically diverse background, and/or living abroad Other Information, including Benefits: Expected Start Date:        After successful US Embassy background check and reference check Insurance:                         Group Health Insurance, Life Insurance, and Workmen Compensation Bonus:                              Eligible for 13th month bonus Paid Holidays:                  Approximately 20 paid holidays/year Annual Leave:                  11 annual leave (paid personal vacation) days/year to start Salary:                              Salary is negotiable within pre-determined range, based on salary history Travel Allowance:            Receives money for meals and incidentals when traveling outside of Bangkok Training:                          Staff development funds and training opportunities as available Application Period: January 1, 2024 – January 26, 2024 To apply: Submit a complete resume during the application period listed above. Notes: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted. One or more positions may be filled from this announcement. Peace Corps may consider international applicants, but reserves the right to prioritize host country national candidates. Contracting Officer reserves the right to accept late applications on an ad hoc basis Candidates must indicate if they have ever previously served as a Peace Corps Trainee, Volunteer, or Staff member. Peace Corps reserves the right to withhold an offer from any candidate with a prior history of poor performance or conduct as a Peace Corps Trainee, Volunteer, or Staff member. Peace Corps reserves the right to withhold an offer to any candidate that is a relative or household member of any current Peace Corps staff member. Peace Corps will not discriminate against an applicant because of that person's race, color, religion, sex (including gender identity, sexual orientation, and pregnancy), national origin, age, disability, or genetic information.

Jobtitle: Japanese Interpreter / ล่ามภาษาญี่ปุ่น (TAP-B)
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ปฏิบัติหน้าที่การเป็นล่ามญี่ปุ่น-ไทยและไทย-ญี่ปุ่น แปลเอกสารญี่ปุ่น-ไทยและไทย-ญี่ปุ่น ประสานงานระหว่างพนักงานไทยกับชาวญี่ปุ่นและหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง เข้าร่วมกิจกรรมด้านคุณภาพ ความปลอดภัยและอื่นๆ ตามนโยบายของบริษัทฯ งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากบริษัทฯ คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาภาษาญี่ปุ่น หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง หากมีประสบการณ์การทำงานด้านแปลภาษา, ล่าม 1 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ยินดีรับพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่ ผลสอบวัดระดับภาษาญี่ปุ่น N2 สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ดี มีความละเอียดรอบคอบในการทำงาน มีทักษะติดต่อประสานงานได้ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้

Jobtitle: Payroll and Admin Specialist/ผู้เชี่ยวชาญทำเงินเดือนพนักงาน
column8: Responsibilities: Collect timesheets and payment orders in different projects and verify that they are in order. Ensure the payroll is processed accurately, timely, and compliantly. Prepare pay slips as per approved timesheets, payment orders, etc. Create and update records of all employees (personal details, bank details, etc) on the payroll system. Provide advice to staff in relation to the payment, taxation, and all deductions. Administer of SSO, personal income tax, workmen compensation, and other benefits. Payroll reconciliation and new Payroll Year preparation. Develop an in-depth understanding of the payroll database to create ad-hoc reports on demand. Understand all aspects of payroll in regard to laws and regulations. Work collaboratively and in a supportive manner with the HR team, finance, and other departments to ensure that the overall objectives are achieved. Maintain absolute discretion and maturity in handling sensitive and confidential data. Provide support on other tasks assigned by supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in any related field. At least 5 years of hands-on experience in managing Payroll, Time & Attendance processes, within a complex international organization. Familiarity with payroll programs. Proficiency in MS Office especially Excel Good command of spoken and written English. Able to work under tight deadlines with flexibility and work well under pressure. Detail-oriented and service minded. A fast learner and good team player with a good attitude and positive thinking.

Jobtitle: Admin Digitonoze
column8: Job Purpose ดำเนินงานที่เกี่ยวกับเอกสารต่างๆในและนอกองค์กร รวมถึงการอำนวยความสะดวก การติดต่อประสานงาน เพื่อให้การปฏิบัติงานของทุกฝ่ายดำเนินไปสู่เป้าหมายที่วางไว้ได้ดีที่สุด สามารถช่วยทำ Corporate Communication ได้ภายในองค์กร โดยเน้นเรื่องเทคโนโลยีและหัวข้อทันสมัย ทันเหตุการณ์ (ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่) Key Task รับ - ส่ง และลงทะเบียนเอกสาร เช่นเอกสาร Memo ทั้งในฝ่ายและฝ่ายอื่นๆในองค์กร งานเก็บรักษาและจัดเรียงเอกสาร NDA, Memo, สัญญาทางธุรกิจต่างๆ เสนอแฟ้มเซ็นต์ เอกสาร เพื่อลงนาม การพิมพ์เอกสาร Memo ต่างๆ การทำใบรับสินค้าและบริการ และตั้งหนี้ ตรงเวลาตามที่กำหนด ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง จัดทำเอกสารเบิกจ่ายต่างๆ รวมถึงสรุปงบประมาณ จัดทำรายงานการประชุม งานอื่น ๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย Job Qualifications ปริญญาตรีสาขาการบริหารธุรกิจ บัญชี หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีทักษะด้านการสื่อสารกับบุคคลภายในและนอกองค์กร มีความสนใจในเทคโนโลยี การเงิน การลงทุน มีทักษะคอมพิวเตอร์ (MS. Office ) และมีทักษะในด้านงานพิมพ์เอกสาร มีทักษะภาษาอังกฤษ สามารถสื่อสารและโต้ตอบอีเมล์ได้ มีความรู้ด้าน Social media และ Canva is a plus มีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับงานธุรการ 1 ปี ขึ้นไป

Jobtitle: Personal Assistant (UK Based)
column8: Job Responsibilities: As personal assistant to attend to the employer’s personal affairs and perform secretarial duties. Assist the day to day running of the employer's home in UK, including  household personnel (chefs, cleaners, drivers) management, formulation household work manual, and supervision of household daily management  matters. Management of children's affairs, including formulation of children's curriculum system, homework guidance, and extra-circular activities arrangement. Requirements: British citizens, Hong Kong residents or Mainland Chinese with British work permit. Graduates from reputable universities, preferably from hotel management related disciplines. 3 years or above working experience. Priority will be given to those with experiences in branded hotels or have served as assistants to corporate executives and household management. Able to be multi-tasking and plan/prioritize various tasks. Good communication skills to establish a good relationship with the employer and children. Responsible, stable and careful. Working Monday to Saturday with flexibility to work overtime. Proficiency in English and Mandarin.

column8: Location: The Livin Ramkhamhaeng Ref: https://livinram.com/ Responsibilities Legal and Mortgage framework – Keep up to date with current law and regulations on property transfer, property purchase. Participate in drafting of residential unit sales and transfer legal and mortgage documents Transfer process execution – Assisting customers throughout mortgage, loan, and property transfer process Sales and Marketing data analysis – Track, input, and analyze sales data, generating reports that assist management in making strategic decisions or updating directions Execution of Sales process – Be responsible for assisting customers in contract signing, obtaining financing, mortgages and entire process to transfer property ownership In charge of oversee the expense of the project Set and adjust price of the room In charge of all document and system process Coordinate with other department to run sales process smoothly Calculate commission of the project Qualification Bachelor degree, experience in related functions within Real Estate industry will be a plus Possess understanding of real estate processes, mortgages, and property transfer Strong sense of responsibility, service-mind, and teamwork Working experience at least 6 month (Trainee experience is consider) Has WeChat account Good in Chinese and Thai language skill is a must Required own laptop or computer (company will provide monthly computer maintenance allowance) Work under high pressure 5 days working shift Able to onboard immediately is highly considered.

Jobtitle: Chinese Interpreter
column8: Responsible the overall Chinese Interpreter in company. Responsible for production interpretation and coordination to support Chinese/Thai in company. Responsible for translating meeting documents, SOPs, workbooks and other documents. Manage and host Chinese/Thai conferences. Responsible to make power point presentations required by the supervisor independently. Handle matters assigned by supervisors. Communicate internal and external event in Chinese language. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or above, at least HSK level 5 or above, has experience studying in China, understands Chinese culture, and understands the current online vocabulary that is widely used in China. Have more than 5 years of working experience in interpreting and Personal Assistant or Secretary (Working experience in Automotive background or Auto parts is preferred). It has high pressure resistance and flexibility, and can respond quickly to the things assigned by the supervisor. Expert knowledge about documentation. Knowledge in relevant legislation, policies, and procedures Good analytical and problem solving skills. Responsible and careful. Self-learning ability, able to effectively accumulate various professional vocabulary in the work. Excellent in communication skills and Presentation.

Jobtitle: เจ้าหน้าที่ธุรการอาคาร/โซนรัชดา
column8: ควบคุมงบประมาณของฝ่ายบริหารอาคาร ดูแลการตั้งเบิกจ่ายค่าสาธารณูปโภคต่างๆ ของอาคาร จัดเตรียมใบแจ้งหนี้ค่าเช่าค่าบริการ และนำส่งให้ผู้เช่า ติดตามหนี้ค้างชำระของผู้เช่า ควบคุมงบประมาณของฝ่ายบริหารอาคาร จัดเตรียมใบแจ้งหนี้ค่าเช่า ค่าบริการ และนำส่งให้ผู้เช่า ทำจ่ายค่าสาธารณูปโภค และค่าอุปกรณ์สำนักงานส่วนกลาง ของอาคาร เช่น ค่าน้ำ ค่าไฟฟ้า ค่าโทรศัพท์ ค่าเก็บขยะค่าภาษีป้าย และอื่นๆ ประสานงาน และจัดทำหนังสือขออนุมัติ และตั้งเบิกจ่ายค่า เบี้ยประกันภัยของอาคาร ดูแลจัดหาอุปกรณ์สำนักงานส่วนกลาง เช่น คอมพิวเตอร์ เครื่องถ่ายเอกสาร และอื่นๆ รวบรวมข้อมูล และนำส่งงบประมาณการจ่ายประจำเดือนของ ฝ่ายบริหารอาคารให้แผนกบัญชี จัดเตรียมเอกสาร และติดต่อประสานงานหน่วยงานภายนอก เช่น การประปานนครหลวง การไฟฟ้านครหลวง เป็นต้น ติดตามหนี้ค้างชำระ จัดทำตารางการปฏิบัติงานของฝ่ายบริหารอาคาร คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา ความรู้และทักษะในงาน มีความรู้ด้านงานธุรการต่างๆ ของอาคารสำนักงาน มีความรู้ด้านการจัดทำ และควบคุมงบประมาณของอาคาร มีความสามารถในการใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี โดยเฉพาะโปรแกรม Microsoft Excel มีทักษะในการจัดทำเอกสารต่างๆ เช่น รายงานการประชุม และ Memorandum ความสามารถทั่วไป มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ มีความกระตือรือร้น มีความรับผิดชอบ มีทักษะการประสานงานกับส่วนงานต่างๆ รวมถึงทักษะการเจรจาต่อรอง ประสบการณ์งานด้านธุรการอาคารสำนักงาน 3 ปี ขึ้นไป

Jobtitle: Japanese Interpreter / ล่ามภาษาญี่ปุ่น (TAP-C)
column8: • ปฏิบัติหน้าที่การเป็นล่ามญี่ปุ่น-ไทยและไทย-ญี่ปุ่น • แปลเอกสารญี่ปุ่น-ไทยและไทย-ญี่ปุ่น • ประสานงานระหว่างพนักงานไทยกับชาวญี่ปุ่นและหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง • เข้าร่วมกิจกรรมด้านคุณภาพ ความปลอดภัยและอื่นๆ ตามนโยบายของบริษัทฯ • งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากบริษัทฯ Qualification • วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาภาษาญี่ปุ่น หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง • ผลสอบวัดระดับภาษาญี่ปุ่น N2 • สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ • สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ดี • มีความละเอียดรอบคอบในการทำงาน • มีทักษะติดต่อประสานงานได้ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้

Jobtitle: ๋Japanese Interpreter/ล่ามภาษาญี่ปุ่น
column8: 【สวัสดิการ】 หยุดสองวันต่อสัปดาห์ วันหยุดพักร้อน 7 วัน/ปี (กรณีที่ไม่ใช้ สามารถนำวันหยุดไปทบยอดกับปีถัดไปได้ ไม่เกิน 15 วัน) เบี้ยขยัน สูงสุด 12,000฿ (ต่อปี) ประกันสังคม โบนัสปีละครั้ง (เงินพิเศษกลางปี ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการของบริษัท) ชุดพนักงาน ค่าภาษา(JLPT N2 ) ขึ้นไป ค่าเช่า 【เนื้อหาของงาน】 เวลาทำงาน 09.00-18.00 น เนื้อหาของงานหลักๆ คือ ล่ามภาษาญี่ปุ่น เรียนรู้การตลาด และการดูแลลูกค้า (งานทั่วไป) 【รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม】 ในแต่ละวันจะมีการไปบริการเปลี่ยนไส้เครื่องกรองของเครื่องกรองน้ำ ซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องกรองน้ำที่บ้านของลูกค้าชาวญี่ปุ่นประมาณ 5-6 ที่ต่อวัน ในช่วงที่เข้าไปจะต้องมีการอธิบายการใช้งานเครื่องกรองน้ำให้กับภรรยาหรือสามีชาวญี่ปุ่นและเป็นล่ามระหว่างช่างกับลูกค้า หรือเจ้าหน้าที่ตึกกับลูกค้า นอกจากนี้ สามารถเรียนรู้เกี่ยวกับด้านการตลาดได้อีกด้วย 【จุดเด่นของบริษัท】 เนื่องจากต้องใช้ภาษาญี่ปุ่น (ฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน) ในการทำงานทุกวัน จึงจะทำให้สามารถพัฒนาภาษาญี่ปุ่นได้อย่างรวดเร็ว อีกทั้ง ยังใช้ภาษาญี่ปุ่นในการสื่อสารภายในบริษัทอีกด้วย ในกรณีที่ไม่เข้าใจภาษาญี่ปุ่น จะมีรุ่นพี่คอยดูแล ไม่ใช่แค่ด้านภาษาเพียงเท่านั้น คุณจะได้ฝึกฝนและเรียนรู้เกี่ยวกับพื้นฐานของการตลาดอีกด้วย นอกจากนี้  คุณยังสามารถนำความรู้และทักษะทางการตลาดที่ได้รับไปใช้ประโยชน์ในอนาคตได้อีกด้วย 【ที่ตั้งบริษัท】 กรุงเทพมหานคร โซนสุขุมวิท (สุขุมวิท ซอย 26) สถานีรถไฟฟ้าใกล้ที่สุดคือ สถานีพร้อมพงษ์ Contact : Khun Fah Polka Dots Co., Ltd 41/3,Soi Atthakravee 1,Sukhumvit 26 Road, Klongton,Klongtoey,Bangkok.10110 Tel. 02-661-3762

Jobtitle: Business Development Manager / Estimator & Bid Manager / Document Controller...
column8: Based at the Procurement Office of an international railway and building construction main contractor in Middle East , the Business Development Manager role is to assist in identifying, pursing, and winning new business opportunities and partnerships to drive company growth and revenue. The Business Development Manager - will prospect through market research, industry events, social media, prospect contact and networking. Benefitting from the expertise and mentoring of the wider Business Development team they will take opportunities to closed/won. Responsibilities: Reach out to potential clients and partners via email, phone calls, meetings, and networking events. Introduce the company's products or services and gather information to assess potential interest. Build and maintain relationships with prospects, clients, and industry contacts. Attend networking events and conferences to expand the professional network. Assist in the development of sales pitches, presentations, and proposals. Collaborate with the sales team to create customised solutions for potential clients. Prepare regular reports on lead generation and business development activities. Collaborate with other departments, including marketing, product development, and sales, to support the Business Development team to win bids and tenders. Requirements: Degree or above in business, marketing or related field with at least 10 years related work experience. Min. 3 years of oversea work experience would be advantage. A basic understanding of the main contractor company structure would be an advantage. Strong interest in business development and sales. Able to work independently. Proactive and self-motivated with a strong desire to learn and grow in the field. Ability to adapt and thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Excellent command of both written and spoken English and Chinese. Candidate with less experience may be considered as Assistant Business Development Manager. The Estimator / Bid Manager - will be working within the Pre Construction team, supporting them in railway infrastructure / building projects that support and develop the local communities in Middle East . Responsibilities: Assemble a bid team with the relevant knowledge and skills to prepare a winning bid Follow the agreed bid management procedures and ensure they are implemented at each stage of the bid process Chair Bid Kick off meetings solution development and mid bid meetings with internal and external stakeholders Develop tender period programme, communicate actions to the team and monitor progress Attend feedback sessions with the client and coordinate tender queries and amendments. Requirememts: Degree or above in Quantity Surveying or equivalent, preferably with MHKIS / MRICS professional qualifications Minimum 5 years of relevant experience of which 5 years with main contractors in leading commercial role for large scale civil projects would be advantage; Proven experience in bid management and quality writing. Bidding experience on railway infrastructure / building projects. Previously worked with a leading national or regional contractor would be advantage. Ability to adapt and thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Excellent command of both written and spoken English and Chinese. Candidate with more experience may be considered as Senior Bid Manager. The Document Controller - will have the following accountabilities: Responsibilities: Manage the requirements for document control on one or more bids to ensure implementation and compliance to standards established within the Business Management System (BMS) Identify contractual requirements in relation to Document control Ensure accurate control of bid documentation from preconstruction/ PQQ through to completion and archiving Liaise with project or bid teams to ensure they have a full understanding of document control and system procedures and provide training and instruction as required such that documentation control requirements are met Ensure that procedures are fully implemented in order to meet requirements of the BMS and other documentation and information systems, e.g. Business Collaborator Manage business archiving such that all documentation is stored efficiently and can be accessed and referenced at all times Work to continuously improve and enhance procedures and systems utilised for document control. Provide feedback such that bid managers are fully aware of all documentation issues Understand and carry out the role specific requirements of the Business Management System and help to identify opportunities for improvement. Requirements: A good understanding of IT An ability to understand how the operations of the department relate to others and work collaboratively to obtain the best outcome for the business Good interpersonal and communication skills Determination to see tasks through to completion, with excellent planning and organisation skills. Good experience of document control gained within the construction sector Experience of co-ordinating the work of others. Attractive salary and fringe benefits will be offered to the right candidates. Interested parties, please send full resume in MS WORD FORMAT, stating expected salary and notice period by clicking "Apply Now". For more information, please visit: www.wecruitcl.com.hk (Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only and will be kept for 12 months. Only short-listed candidates will be notified.)

Jobtitle: Document Controller Leader (DCC)/หัวหน้าฝ่ายควบคุมเอกสาร
column8: Manage and supervise a team of Document controllers if applicable. Produce, review and ensure of the quality and follow-up of the MDR and Vendor Registers according to project contract scope of work, instructions and COMPANY standards. Perform and supervise all types of documents: technical documents, produced deliverables, internal document and references documents into a Master Document Register. Prepare, review and register all contractual correspondence files in a centralized master file. Contribute to the quality assurance/control of procedures and deliverables. Proactively highlight any engineering best practices or standards into deliverables as part of APM Team continuous improvement initiatives. Manage with of the necessary stationery for the constitution of deliverables such as maintenance files: files, binders, index cards. Vigilantly highlight any technical engineering deviations or non-conformance or unacceptable risk to superior hierarchy level. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree Minimum level of experience required 3 years English (C-Professional working proficiency) Coreskills: Leadership / Team Management / Problem solving / Reporting / Communication
